definition: a pretentious and luxurious country residence with extensive grounds
details:
noun
- a pretentious and luxurious country residence with extensive grounds
= example: a pretentious and luxurious country residence with extensive grounds
- a country house in ancient Rome consisting of residential quarters and farm buildings around a courtyard
= example: a country house in ancient Rome consisting of residential quarters and farm buildings around a courtyard
- a detached or semidetached suburban house
= example: a detached or semidetached suburban house
